metadata.name: AIR SMOKE ZERO™ #001
metadata.description:
1Block is Japan's first digital fashion label utilizing NFT and blockchain technology. 

Based on the AIR SMOKE ONE™, Japan's first virtual sneaker, the AIR SMOKE ZERO™ celebrates our original creation. In addition to granting owners exclusive airdrops, the AIR SMOKE ZERO™ is metaverse enabled and will have original avatar integration (updates schedule TBA). 

To learn more and be part of our community, join us at our official discord:https://discord.com/invite/1block
